  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.dsm.engine.app.TupleSender

  • public class TupleSender
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a clean interface/implementation to send tuple insertions to remote instances of DSMEngine.
    Author:
    dawood
